mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO REQUEST( REQ_SEQ, USER_SEQ, PIANO_SEQ, REQ_CONTENT, PHOTO_DIR, PREF_DATE, REGDATE, UPDDATE, UPDATER_SEQ, REQ_TITLE, PRIVATE_SEQ )VALUES( REQ_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{user_seq}, #{piano_seq}, #{req_content}, #{photo_dir}, #{pref_date}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{user_seq}, #{req_title}, #{private_seq} )
SELECT REQ_SEQ.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT REQ_SEQ, PIANO_SEQ, PIANO_NAME, REQ_TITLE, REGDATE, BIDS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, REQ_SEQ, PIANO_SEQ, PIANO_NAME, REQ_TITLE, REGDATE, BIDS FROM (SELECT R.REQ_SEQ AS REQ_SEQ, R.PIANO_SEQ AS PIANO_SEQ, P.PIANO_NAME AS PIANO_NAME, R.REQ_TITLE AS REQ_TITLE, R.REGDATE AS REGDATE, NVL((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DEAL WHERE DEAL_STATE=0 GROUP BY REQ_SEQ HAVING REQ_SEQ=R.REQ_SEQ),0) AS BIDS FROM REQUEST R, PIANO P WHERE USER_SEQ=#{user_seq} AND R.PIANO_SEQ=P.PIANO_SEQ AND R.PRIVATE_SEQ IS NULL AND R.REQ_STATE=0 ORDER BY R.REGDATE DESC ) ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startIndex}+1 AND #{startIndex}+#{cntPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM REQUEST WHERE USER_SEQ=#{0} AND PRIVATE_SEQ IS NULL AND REQ_STATE=0

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, REQ_SEQ, PIANO_NAME, REQ_TITLE, REGDATE, REQ_STATE, PRIVATE_TUNER_NAME, BIDS FROM (SELECT R.REQ_SEQ AS REQ_SEQ, R.PIANO_SEQ AS PIANO_SEQ, P.PIANO_NAME AS PIANO_NAME, R.REQ_TITLE AS REQ_TITLE, R.REGDATE AS REGDATE, R.REQ_STATE AS REQ_STATE, (SELECT USER_NAME FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_SEQ=R.PRIVATE_SEQ) AS PRIVATE_TUNER_NAME, NVL((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DEAL WHERE DEAL_STATE=0 GROUP BY REQ_SEQ HAVING REQ_SEQ=R.REQ_SEQ),0) AS BIDS FROM REQUEST R, PIANO P WHERE USER_SEQ=#{user_seq} AND R.PIANO_SEQ=P.PIANO_SEQ AND R.PRIVATE_SEQ IS NOT NULL AND R.REQ_STATE<>1)) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startIndex}+1 AND #{startIndex}+#{cntPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM REQUEST WHERE USER_SEQ=#{0} AND PRIVATE_SEQ IS NOT NULL AND REQ_STATE<>1

SELECT R.REQ_SEQ, R.USER_SEQ, R.PIANO_SEQ, R.REQ_TITLE, R.REQ_CONTENT, R.PRIVATE_SEQ, R.PREF_DATE, P.SIDO_NAME, P.SGG_NAME, R.PRIVATE_SEQ, R.REQ_STATE, R.PHOTO_DIR FROM REQUEST R, PIANO P WHERE REQ_SEQ=#{0} AND R.PIANO_SEQ=P.PIANO_SEQ
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM REQUEST WHERE REQ_SEQ=#{0} AND REQ_STATE=0
mapper.update: UPDATE REQUEST SET REQ_STATE=1 WHERE REQ_SEQ=#{0}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, REQ_SEQ, REQ_TITLE, REGDATE, REQUESTER_NICK, BIDS FROM (SELECT REQ_SEQ, REQ_TITLE, REGDATE, (SELECT USER_NAME FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_SEQ=REQUEST.USER_SEQ) AS REQUESTER_NICK, NVL((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DEAL WHERE DEAL_STATE=0 GROUP BY REQ_SEQ HAVING REQ_SEQ=REQUEST.REQ_SEQ),0) AS BIDS FROM REQUEST WHERE PRIVATE_SEQ=#{tuner_seq} AND REQ_STATE=0) ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM REQUEST WHERE PRIVATE_SEQ=#{0} AND REQ_STATE=0
SELECT LAST_NUMBER FROM USER_SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_NAME='REQ_SEQ'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, REQ_SEQ, REQ_TITLE, REGDATE, PRIVATE_SEQ, REQUESTER_NICK, BIDS FROM (SELECT REQ_SEQ, REQ_TITLE, REGDATE, PRIVATE_SEQ, (SELECT USER_NAME FROM USERINFO WHERE USER_SEQ=REQUEST.USER_SEQ) AS REQUESTER_NICK, NVL((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DEAL WHERE DEAL_STATE=0 GROUP BY REQ_SEQ HAVING REQ_SEQ=REQUEST.REQ_SEQ),0) AS BIDS FROM REQUEST WHERE REQ_STATE=0 ORDER BY REGDATE DESC ) ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM REQUEST WHERE REQ_STATE=0
